SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.splendorserver.model.action

Enum Class Action

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Action>
ca.mcgill.splendorserver.model.action.Action
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Action>, Constable
@Embeddable public enum Action extends Enum<Action>
Represents an action made in the Splendor game. A player can purchase cards, reserve cards or take gem tokens. Additional actions are added for extensions.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Details

    • PURCHASE_DEV

      public static final Action PURCHASE_DEV
      Purchase type Action. Card must be face up in middle of table or a previously reserved one.

    • TAKE_TOKEN

      public static final Action TAKE_TOKEN
      Taking one token at a time.

    • PURCHASE_DEV_RECEIVE_NOBLE

      public static final Action PURCHASE_DEV_RECEIVE_NOBLE
      Purchase type Action. A noble visits the current player after they have purchased a card.

    • TAKE_3_GEM_TOKENS_DIFF_COL

      public static final Action TAKE_3_GEM_TOKENS_DIFF_COL
      This action allows players to take 3 different-coloured gem tokens.

    • TAKE_3_GEM_TOKENS_DIFF_COL_RET_1

      public static final Action TAKE_3_GEM_TOKENS_DIFF_COL_RET_1
      This action allows players to take 3 different-coloured gem tokens. 1 token must be returned to the bank because the player has 11 tokens after taking the 3 new tokens.

    • TAKE_3_GEM_TOKENS_DIFF_COL_RET_2

      public static final Action TAKE_3_GEM_TOKENS_DIFF_COL_RET_2
      This action allows players to take 3 different-coloured gem tokens. 2 tokens must be returned to the bank because the player has 12 tokens after taking the 3 new tokens.

    • TAKE_3_GEM_TOKENS_DIFF_COL_RET_3

      public static final Action TAKE_3_GEM_TOKENS_DIFF_COL_RET_3
      This action allows players to take 3 different-coloured gem tokens. 3 tokens must be returned to the bank because the player has 13 tokens after taking the 3 new tokens.

    • TAKE_2_GEM_TOKENS_SAME_COL

      public static final Action TAKE_2_GEM_TOKENS_SAME_COL
      This action allows players to take 2 same-coloured gem tokens. This action is only possible if there are at least 4 tokens of the chosen color left when the player takes them.

    • TAKE_2_GEM_TOKENS_SAME_COL_RET_1

      public static final Action TAKE_2_GEM_TOKENS_SAME_COL_RET_1
      This action allows players to take 2 same-coloured gem tokens. 1 token must be returned to the bank because the player has 11 tokens after taking the 2 new tokens.

    • TAKE_2_GEM_TOKENS_SAME_COL_RET_2

      public static final Action TAKE_2_GEM_TOKENS_SAME_COL_RET_2
      This action allows players to take 2 same-coloured gem tokens. 2 tokens must be returned to the bank because the player has 12 tokens after taking the 2 new tokens.

    • RESERVE_DEV

      public static final Action RESERVE_DEV
      Reserve type action. A gold token is not received upon reserving a card because there are no gold tokens left.

    • RESERVE_DEV_TAKE_JOKER

      public static final Action RESERVE_DEV_TAKE_JOKER
      Reserve type Action. A gold token is received upon reserving a card.

    • RESERVE_NOBLE

      public static final Action RESERVE_NOBLE
      Reserve noble type action. Some Orient expansion cards allow a player to reserve a noble upon purchasing the card.

    • CASCADE_LEVEL_1

      public static final Action CASCADE_LEVEL_1
      Cascade level 1 type action. Some Orient expansion cards allow a player to choose a free level 1 Orient card upon purchasing the card.

    • CASCADE_LEVEL_2

      public static final Action CASCADE_LEVEL_2
      Cascade level 2 type action. Some Orient expansion cards allow a player to choose a free level 2 Orient card upon purchasing the card.

    • PAIR_SPICE_CARD

      public static final Action PAIR_SPICE_CARD
      Pair spice card type action. Some Orient expansion cards allow a player to pair the purchased card with a development card in their inventory. The paired spice card will then have the same gem discount type as the card that it was paired with. The gem discount will be worth 1.

    • DISCARD_2_WHITE_CARDS

      public static final Action DISCARD_2_WHITE_CARDS
      Discard 2 white cards type action. Some Orient expansion cards force a player to discard 2 cards of a certain type in their inventory upon purchasing the card.

    • DISCARD_2_BLUE_CARDS

      public static final Action DISCARD_2_BLUE_CARDS
      Discard 2 blue cards type action. Some Orient expansion cards force a player to discard 2 cards of a certain type in their inventory upon purchasing the card.

    • DISCARD_2_GREEN_CARDS

      public static final Action DISCARD_2_GREEN_CARDS
      Discard 2 green cards type action. Some Orient expansion cards force a player to discard 2 cards of a certain type in their inventory upon purchasing the card.

    • DISCARD_2_RED_CARDS

      public static final Action DISCARD_2_RED_CARDS
      Discard 2 red cards type action. Some Orient expansion cards force a player to discard 2 cards of a certain type in their inventory upon purchasing the card.

    • DISCARD_2_BLACK_CARDS

      public static final Action DISCARD_2_BLACK_CARDS
      Discard 2 black cards type action. Some Orient expansion cards force a player to discard 2 cards of a certain type in their inventory upon purchasing the card.

    • TAKE_1_GEM_TOKEN

      public static final Action TAKE_1_GEM_TOKEN
      Take 1 gem token type action. This is used for two Trading post expansion powers. One where a player is allowed to take 1 token after purchasing a card. The other where a player is allowed to take 1 token of a different colour after taking 2 same-coloured gems.

    • TAKE_1_GEM_TOKEN_RET_1

      public static final Action TAKE_1_GEM_TOKEN_RET_1
      Take 1 gem token type action. This is used for two Trading post expansion powers. One where a player is allowed to take 1 token after purchasing a card. The other where a player is allowed to take 1 token of a different colour after taking 2 same-coloured gems. 1 token must be returned to the bank because the player has 11 tokens after taking the 2 new tokens.

    • PLACE_COAT_OF_ARMS

      public static final Action PLACE_COAT_OF_ARMS
      Place coat of arms type action. This occurs automatically after noble visitation. If a player qualifies for a trading post slot the coat of arms of their colour is placed on the trading post slot.
